plot: After a death in the family a woman must revisit her past and hold together her shattered family by keeping a tradition alive.
title: Coq au vin
plot_es: After a death in the family a woman must revisit her past and hold together her shattered family by keeping a tradition alive.
plot_en: After a death in the family a woman must revisit her past and hold together her shattered family by keeping a tradition alive.
